code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ForgotPassword(){const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const handleReset=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(!email){alert('‚ö†Ô∏è Please enter your email.');return;}alert("\uD83D\uDCE9 Password reset link sent to ".concat(email));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"auth-page",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"auth-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Forgot Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"subtitle",children:"We\u2019ll send you a reset link"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleReset,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Enter your registered email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Send Reset Link"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"auth-links",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:"Back to Login"})})]})]})});}export default ForgotPassword;
